reviews.review: Meilleur jeu de tous les temps
excellent game once you take the time to learn it!
Melhor jogo que pode existir, já jogo aos anos e nunca me fartei dele.
played it a couple times, its alright

Its CSGO what more is there to say, its great fun, matchmaking can be a little slow and I wish you could see your ELO but It provides plenty of fun. Also lots of new gamemodes added over the year to spice things up.
its fun to play with friends but the problem its full of hackers even in prime so if you want to enjoy it more and play without hackers try faceit :)
best game ever to learn french russia AND AMERICAN
Bardzo fajna gierka ale ta mapa office to juz nie taka fajna
Played over 600 hours for over the course of probably 2 years. Just to get randomly VAC banned from the game. Never cheated in my life, I don't even have more than one account.
çok kanser, oyun sanki eğlenmek için değil sabretmek için yapılmış.

Got called several profanities and stereotypes based upon my accent alone. 10/10 would cry again.

Only one bad thing in this game is,there is to many cheaters in Competitive Matchmaking games.

do you have games on your phone

All maps have the same concept to them: mid, long, short, etc. So there isn't a lot of variety to maps. The game play eventually just becomes repetitive. In my opinion this game is only fun with friends and when you screw around.
It is a very fun game!!!
